languages.text: {n}Слова Драйвстема явно поколебали уверенность девушки. Ее речь становится путанной и неубедительной. Из ее сбивчивой речи становится ясно, что она горит идеей организации какой-то сети маяков... и что эту идею явно стоит похоронить. Наконец, покраснев от стыда, Астарция умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Слова Драйвстема явно поколебали уверенность девушки. Ее речь становится путанной и неубедительной. Из ее сбивчивой речи становится ясно, что она горит идеей организации какой-то астропатической сети... и что эту идею явно стоит похоронить. Наконец, покраснев от стыда, Астарция умолкает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes confused and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea of setting up some kind of network of beacons... and that this idea should probably be scrapped. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова Драйвстема явно поколебали уверенность девушки. Ее речь становится путанной и неубедительной. Из ее сбивчивой речи становится ясно, что она горит идеей организации какой-то сети маяков... и что эту идею явно стоит похоронить. Наконец, покраснев от стыда, Астарция умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Urbend's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes tangled and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea to set up some kind of Astropathic network... and that this idea should probably be buried. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムの言葉がアスタルチアの自信を揺らがせたのは明白だ。アスタルチアの話は支離滅裂で理解しがたいものになる。そのとりとめのない長話から分かったのは、アスタルチアは何らかのビーコンネットワークを作ることに執着しているという点…そしてこの案はおそらく放棄すべきという点だ。ついには恥ずかしさで顔を赤らめ、アスタルチアは話すのをやめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes confused and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea of setting up some kind of network of beacons... and that this idea should probably be scrapped. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムの言葉がアスタルチアの自信を揺らがせたのは明白だ。アスタルチアの話は支離滅裂で理解しがたいものになる。そのとりとめのない長話から分かったのは、アスタルチアは何らかのビーコンネットワークを作ることに執着しているという点…そしてこの案はおそらく放棄すべきという点だ。ついには恥ずかしさで顔を赤らめ、アスタルチアは話すのをやめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，德莱夫斯塔的话动摇了艾丝塔西娅的信心。她的言辞变得语无伦次，缺乏说服力。从她杂乱无章的谈话中，你只能听得出来她打算建立某种信标网络……而现在看来，这个想法或许应该打消才是。到了最后，艾丝塔西娅涨红了脸，羞愧难当地住了口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes confused and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea of setting up some kind of network of beacons... and that this idea should probably be scrapped. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，德莱夫斯塔的话动摇了艾丝塔西娅的信心。她的言辞变得语无伦次，缺乏说服力。从她杂乱无章的谈话中，你只能听得出来她打算建立某种信标网络……而现在看来，这个想法或许应该打消才是。到了最后，艾丝塔西娅涨红了脸，羞愧难当地住了口。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las palabras de Drivestem han socavado la confianza de Astartia. Su discurso se vuelve confuso y poco convincente. Todo lo que sacas en claro es que está obsesionada con la idea de establecer una red de balizas... y que la idea no tiene futuro. Sonrojada por la vergüenza, Astartia se detiene.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes confused and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea of setting up some kind of network of beacons... and that this idea should probably be scrapped. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las palabras de Drivestem han socavado la confianza de Astartia. Su discurso se vuelve confuso y poco convincente. Todo lo que sacas en claro es que está obsesionada con la idea de establecer una red de balizas... y que la idea no tiene futuro. Sonrojada por la vergüenza, Astartia se detiene.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'intervention de Drivestem a clairement ébranlé la confiance d'Astartia, dont le discours perd toute substance et cohérence. Tout ce que vous parvenez à comprendre, c'est qu'elle semble obsédée par l'idée d'installer une sorte de réseau de balises... mais que ce n'est peut-être pas une si bonne idée que ça. Astartia finit par s'interrompre, rouge comme une pivoine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes confused and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea of setting up some kind of network of beacons... and that this idea should probably be scrapped. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'intervention de Drivestem a clairement ébranlé la confiance d'Astartia, dont le discours perd toute substance et cohérence. Tout ce que vous parvenez à comprendre, c'est qu'elle semble obsédée par l'idée d'installer une sorte de réseau de balises... mais que ce n'est peut-être pas une si bonne idée que ça. Astartia finit par s'interrompre, rouge comme une pivoine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestems Worte haben Astartias Selbstvertrauen spürbar erschüttert. Ihr Vortrag wird verwirrend und wenig überzeugend. Du kannst ihren Worten lediglich entnehmen, dass sie davon besessen scheint, eine Art Signalnetzwerk aufzubauen ... und dass man diese Idee wohl besser nicht weiter verfolgen sollte. Schließlich bricht Astartia ab, rot vor Scham.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes confused and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea of setting up some kind of network of beacons... and that this idea should probably be scrapped. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestems Worte haben Astartias Selbstvertrauen spürbar erschüttert. Ihr Vortrag wird verwirrend und wenig überzeugend. Du kannst ihren Worten lediglich entnehmen, dass sie davon besessen scheint, eine Art Signalnetzwerk aufzubauen ... und dass man diese Idee wohl besser nicht weiter verfolgen sollte. Schließlich bricht Astartia ab, rot vor Scham.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drivestem'in sözleri belli ki Astartia'nın öz güvenini sarsmış. Anlattıklarını karıştırıyor, kimseyi ikna edemiyor. Sayıkladıklarından tek anladığın, bir tür parıldak ağı kurmakla kafayı bozduğu... Bir de bu fikrin muhtemelen saçma olduğu. Nihayet utançtan yüzü kızaran Astartia, konuşmayı bırakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Drivestem's words have clearly shaken Astartia's confidence. Her speech becomes confused and unconvincing. All you can tell from her rambling is that she is obsessed with the idea of setting up some kind of network of beacons... and that this idea should probably be scrapped. At last, red with shame, Astartia stops.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drivestem'in sözleri belli ki Astartia'nın öz güvenini sarsmış. Anlattıklarını karıştırıyor, kimseyi ikna edemiyor. Sayıkladıklarından tek anladığın, bir tür parıldak ağı kurmakla kafayı bozmuş olması... Ayrıca bu fikrin de muhtemelen saçma olduğu. Nihayet utançtan yüzü kızaran Astartia konuşmayı bırakıyor.{/n}
